trans-unit.source: The <see cref="N:System.ServiceModel.Security" /> namespace deals with general security-related topics, for example, <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite" />.
trans-unit.target: O namespace <see cref="N:System.ServiceModel.Security" /> lida com tópicos gerais relacionados à segurança, por exemplo, <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite" />.

trans-unit.source: For topics dealing with security tokens and certificates, for example <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.WrappedKeySecurityToken> see <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens>.
trans-unit.target: Para tópicos de lidar com tokens de segurança e certificados, por exemplo <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.WrappedKeySecurityToken> consulte <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens>.

trans-unit.source: For security topics that overlap with the service model, for example <xref:System.ServiceModel.TcpTransportSecurity>, see <xref:System.ServiceModel>.
trans-unit.target: Tópicos de segurança que se sobrepõem com o modelo de serviço, por exemplo <xref:System.ServiceModel.TcpTransportSecurity>, consulte <xref:System.ServiceModel>.
